entities.name: butterbeer
entities.description: Butterbeer is a popular drink among students at Hogwarts. It was mentioned by Harry as something he likes.

entities.name: hogsmeade
entities.description: Hogsmeade is a village near Hogwarts where students can visit on weekends. Ron and Hermione brought butterbeer back from there for Harry.

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: Gryffindor is one of the four houses at Hogwarts. Professor Lupin mentioned a Gryffindor victory against Ravenclaw.

entities.name: ravenclaw
entities.description: Ravenclaw is one of the four houses at Hogwarts. Professor Lupin mentioned a Gryffindor victory against Ravenclaw.

entities.name: dementor
entities.description: Dementors are foul creatures that serve as guards for Azkaban prison. Harry asked what is under their hood.

relationships.description: Harry likes butterbeer, which he mentioned when Lupin raised an eyebrow.
Ron and Hermione brought butterbeer back from Hogsmeade for Harry.
Professor Lupin mentioned a Gryffindor victory against Ravenclaw.
Dementors have their hood, which they lower only to use their last and worst weapon.
